attributes.action: Stop the charge for drivers entering greater london
attributes.additional_details: This is another tax on drivers and will hit people on low incomes very hard. £5 a day is robbery and people won't be able to afford to travel to work then they'll be unemployed and the government will see a huge increase in people claiming benefits.
attributes.background: Stop tfl from charging people who live outside greater london who drive into london to work.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. This is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

You can petition the London Assembly directly: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
